description:
Relatively continuous action in mild flow, about 3 nice slides and 3 jumps. Much better quality than the upper section, yet no comparison to the bigger water, better narrows, better slides and jumps in the other Ticino canyons such as Iragna, Lodrino, Osogna, Pontirone.

Approach

Descent

You have to telephone at number 0041 91 756 66 15 to announce that you want descent the canyon and you will be informed if it's possible or not because hidroelectric installations. At the end of your descent you recall to say you have finished and that's all good. Just in case of maintenance of installations they could inform you that it's not possible to do the canyon.

Exit

Red tape

Hydroelectric plant. Infoline OFIBLE (Officine Idroelettriche Blenio) 0041 91 756 66 15 Don't forget it!! You must call every time to announce you're going in the canyon, and don't forget to call when you will be out of the canyon.
